channel.title: Learn Programming. [ server base ]
channel.description: Well guys , I am 3 years in rs-ps ''thing'' now. and i didn't learn like anything just like changing npc's shops etc those things. i want to start learning this language. wich base do you recommend for me ? and wich source. thank you.

item.title: Learn Programming. [ server base ]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

If you wish to learn with out gaining a lot of the bad habits from other servers then you should use a framework like Hyperion, Apollo, or even Rune-Source.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn Programming. [ server base ]
item.dc:creator: @rifblood rifblood
item.description:
@rifblood wrote:

[quote=“T0xicsnip3r, post:6, topic:444102”]hold 10 players? i used to use insidia last month and i always had atleast 20+ players on at one time , hosting from my computer with no-ip…
and what do u mean by messy… i organized mine and fixed any bugs and disabled dupes.[/quote]

i’m not doing this for hosting , i’m doing this for learn 2 program.
i already hosted many servers with 40+ online.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn Programming. [ server base ]

item.description:

item.title: Learn Programming. [ server base ]
item.dc:creator: @rifblood rifblood
item.description:
@rifblood wrote:

T0xicsnip3r:

Just use [Pi] insidiax because its easy to code. and theres many guides that work pefectly for learning how to code with it if ur new.

i will not use InsidiaX because its really messy and unstable already full of features. i’m getting sick of PI though.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn Programming. [ server base ]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“T0xicsnip3r, post:2, topic:444102”]Just use [Pi] insidiax because its easy to code. and theres many guides that work pefectly for learning how to code with it if ur new.[/quote]Lol don’t do that… That base is very unstable and in all if you host it you’ll only be able to hold up like 10 players.

Use a clean project insanity, hyperion, apollo, or runesource… I don’t really recommend delta though.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn Programming. [ server base ]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

I suggest you start with a framework either runesource, hyperion, or apollo will be good. You should also read up on the Java docs and tutorials to learn more, I don’t suggest PI or another old WinterLove based server because it will teach you some bad habits. That is if you want to continue onto other languages and such.

Read full topic
